deleteSavedGameText.text: Are you sure you want to delete saved game "SAVED_GAME_NAME" with players PLAYERS_LIST?

kickedText.text: Another player logged onto the server with your player name and password, so you have been kicked.

playerAlreadyExists.text: That player name is already in use on this server, please try another.

yourConnectionIsAlreadyLoggedIn.text: You are already logged in. Log out before attempting to log in again.

playerNameOrPasswordNotRecognized.text: Your player name or password is not recognized.

anotherConnectionUsingYourPlayerID.text: Your player name is already logged into this server from another client, or perhaps you were disconnected so the server has an idle connection. Use a different name, or try again and tick 'Kick existing connection' to boot the other client.

notLoggedIn.text: You can't log out since you were not logged in.
You must log in before you can request a list of sessions that you could join.
You must log into the server before you can create or join a game.

alreadyInSession.text: You are already in a game and cannot create or join another one.
Vous êtes déjà en cours de partie et ne pouvez créer ou rejoindre une autre partie.
Jesteś już w grze i nie możesz stworzyć ani dołączyć do innej.

sessionIDNotFound.text: The game you tried to join could not be found (it likely ended since the list of running games was retrieved from the server).
La partie que vous avez essayé de rejoindre n'a pas pu être trouvée (c'est comme si elle s'était terminée puisque la liste des parties en cours vient d'être mise à jour par le serveur).
Gra do której próbowałeś się dołączyć nie została znaleziona (najprawdopodobniej skończyła się po otrzymaniu z serwera listy trwających gier).

sessionFull.text: The game you are trying to join is already full.
La partie que vous essayez de rejoindre est déjà complète.
Gra do której chcesz się dołączyć jest już pełna.

notLoggedIn.text: You can't leave a session since you were not logged in.

notInSession.text: You can't leave a session since you weren't in one.

notLoggedIn.text: You must log into the server before you can browse saved games.

alreadyInSession.text: You are already in a game and cannot browse save games.

savedGamesNotSupported.text: The server isn't configured for browsing saved games.

notLoggedIn.text: You must log into the server before you can browse save points.

alreadyInSession.text: You are already in a game and cannot browse save points.

savedGameIDNotFound.text: The saved game you requested could not be found.

savedGamesNotSupported.text: The server isn't configured for browsing save points.

notLoggedIn.text: You must log into the server before you can delete a saved game.

alreadyInSession.text: You are already in a game and cannot delete a saved game.

savedGameIDNotFound.text: The saved game you requested to delete could not be found.

savedGamesNotSupported.text: The server isn't configured for deleting saved games.

notLoggedIn.text: You must log into the server before you can load a saved game.

alreadyInSession.text: You are already in a game and cannot load a saved game.

savedGameIDNotFound.text: The saved game you requested could not be found.

savedGameFilenameNotFound.text: The save point you requested could not be found.

savedGamesNotSupported.text: The server isn't configured for load saved games.

unknownHostException.text: Address unavailable. Typically this means you entered a bad address that could not be resolved to an IP address by DNS.
Adresse non disponible. Typiquement, cela signifie que vous avez saisi une mauvaise adresse qui ne peut être résolue en adresse IP par DNS.
Adres niedostępny. Najprawdopodobniej oznacza to, że wpisałeś zły adres IP, który nie mógł zostać znaleziony przez DNS.

timedOut.text: Connection timed out. Typically this means you were unable to contact the requested server, or the MoM IME port was blocked by a firewall.
Délai de connexion dépassé. Typiquement, cela signifie que vous n'avez pas réussi à contacter le serveur désiré, ou que le port MoM IME a été bloqué par un pare-feu.
Przekroczono czas na oczekiwanie. Najprawdopodobniej oznacza to, że nie mogłeś połączyć się z danym serwerem, albo port MoM IME został zablokowany przez firewalla.

refused.text: Connection refused. Typically this means you were able to connect to the MoM IME port on the requested server, but that the MoM IME server wasn't running.
Connexion refusée. Typiquement, cela signifie que vous avez été en mesure de vous connecter au port MoM IME sur le serveur demandé, seulement le serveur MoM IME n'est pas en attente.
Połączenie zerwane. Najprawdopodobniej oznacza to, że udało ci się połączyć z portem MoM IME na danym serwerze, ale serwer ten nie działał.

other.text: Connection attempted failed with an unusual error code.
La tentative de connexion a échouée avec un code erreur inhabituel.
Próba połączenia nie powiodła się, z nietypowym kodem błędu.

unexpectedConversationTag.text: Connected to server, but this server appears to be running ACTUAL_ELEMENT instead of EXPECTED_ELEMENT.

badStream.text: Connected to server, but the data from the server is not in the expected format. Typically this means you connected to something other than a MoM IME server.

switchOffSpell.text: Do you wish to cancel your SPELL_NAME spell?

switchOffSpellNotOurs.text: You didn't cast the SPELL_NAME spell and so cannot switch it off.

whoWillCastTitle.text: Select who, or which item, will cast a spell

ourDispelMagicSuccess.text: PLAYER_NAME's SPELL_NAME, CASTING_COST MP, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispelled

ourDispelMagicFail.text: PLAYER_NAME's SPELL_NAME, CASTING_COST MP, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispel failed

theirDispelMagicSuccess.text: SPELL_NAME, CASTING_COST MP, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispelled

theirDispelMagicFail.text: SPELL_NAME, CASTING_COST MP, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispel failed

ourSpellBindingSuccess.text: PLAYER_NAME's SPELL_NAME, CASTING_COST MP, PERCENTAGE% chance - bound

ourSpellBindingFail.text: PLAYER_NAME's SPELL_NAME, CASTING_COST MP, PERCENTAGE% chance - binding failed

theirSpellBindingSuccess.text: SPELL_NAME, CASTING_COST MP, PERCENTAGE% chance - bound

theirSpellBindingFail.text: SPELL_NAME, CASTING_COST MP, PERCENTAGE% chance - binding failed

ourCounterMagicHeading.text: You attempted to cast SPELL_NAME which may be countered by:

theirCounterMagicHeading.text: PLAYER_NAME attempted to cast SPELL_NAME which may be countered by:

ourCounterMagicSuccess.text: Our COMBAT_AREA_EFFECT_NAME with strength DISPELLING_POWER, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispelled

ourCounterMagicFail.text: Our COMBAT_AREA_EFFECT_NAME with strength DISPELLING_POWER, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispel failed

theirCounterMagicSuccess.text: PLAYER_NAME's COMBAT_AREA_EFFECT_NAME with strength DISPELLING_POWER, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispelled

theirCounterMagicFail.text: PLAYER_NAME's COMBAT_AREA_EFFECT_NAME with strength DISPELLING_POWER, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispel failed

nodeCounterMagicSuccess.text: The dispelling power of the node, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispelled

nodeCounterMagicFail.text: The dispelling power of the node, PERCENTAGE% chance - dispel failed

invalidMagicRealmLifeformType.text: This spell can only be cast on the following type(s) of unit:
Ce sort ne seulement être jetés sur les unités de types suivants :
Ten czar może zostać rzucony tylko na następujące typy jednostek:

noUnitSpellEffectIDsDefined.text: Definition for spell SPELL_NAME does not specify any unit effects.

enchantingEnemyUnit.text: SPELL_NAME can only be cast on your own units.
SPELL_NAME ne peut être jeté que sur vos propres unités.
Czar SPELL_NAME może zostać rzucony tylko na własne jednostki.

cursingOwnUnit.text: SPELL_NAME can only be cast on enemy units.
SPELL_NAME ne peut seulement être jeté sur les unités ennemies.
Czar SPELL_NAME może zostać rzucony tylko na jednostki przeciwnika.

alreadyHasAllPossibleUnitSpellEffects.text: This unit already has SPELL_NAME cast on it.

noCitySpellEffectIDsDefined.text: Definition for spell SPELL_NAME does not specify any city effects or a building.

enchantingEnemyCity.text: SPELL_NAME can only be cast on your own cities.

cursingOwnCity.text: SPELL_NAME can only be cast on enemy cities.

alreadyHasAllPossibleCitySpellEffects.text: This city already has SPELL_NAME cast on it.

alreadyHasBuilding.text: This city already has a BUILDING_NAME.

tooHighResistance.text:
This unit has too high resistance to suffer any effect from this spell.
Note some spells such as Banish and Life Drain allow additional Mana to be channeled into the spell to reduce the target's resistance.

immune.text: This unit is completely immune to SPELL_NAME and similar spells.

unitNotInExpectedCombat.text: This unit is not in the expected combat location.

undamaged.text: This unit has taken no damage.

permanentlyDamaged.text: This unit has suffered permanent damage that cannot be healed normally.

unhealableLifeformType.text: This type of unit cannot be healed.

noEnemySpellsUnit.text: This unit has no enchantments or curses cast by an enemy wizard for you to try to dispel.

noEnemySpellsLocation.text: There are no enchantments or curses cast by an enemy wizard at this location for you to try to dispel.

cannotSeeLocation.text: SPELL_NAME can only be targeted at locations you can see.

cannotSeeCity.text: SPELL_NAME can only be targeted at cities you can see.

cannotSeeUnit.text: SPELL_NAME can only be targeted at units you can see.

wizardHasDeathBooks.text: SPELL_NAME has no effect on cities owned by wizards who have death books.

locationAlreadyCorrupted.text: This location already has SPELL_NAME cast on it.

invalidTileType.text: SPELL_NAME cannot be targeted at this type of tile.

invalidMapFeature.text: SPELL_NAME cannot be targeted at this type of map feature.

enemiesHere.text: You cannot summon on top of enemy units.

cellFull.text: There are already the maximum number of units here.

terrainImpassable.text: The SPELL_NAME cannot be summoned on this type of terrain.

changeUnitTerrainImpassable.text: SPELL_NAME cannot be cast on units on this type of terrain.

unownedNode.text: SPELL_NAME can only be used on nodes owned by an enemy wizard.

noRangedAttack.text: SPELL_NAME can only be used against units who have a ranged attack.

invalidRangedAttackType.text: SPELL_NAME cannot be used against units whose ranged attack is magical or boulders.

noAmmunition.text: This unit already has no ammunition left.

tooMuchExperience.text: This unit has already attained Elite or Commander experience level.

attackingOwnWizard.text: You cannot cast SPELL_NAME on yourself.

notAWizard.text: SPELL_NAME can only be targeted at wizards, not raiders or monsters.

wizardBanishedOrDefeated.text: You cannot cast spells at wizards who are banished or defeated.

noSpellBeingCast.text: PLAYER_NAME is not casting any overland spell to blast.

insufficientMana.text: You do not have enough mana stored to blast PLAYER_NAME's BLASTED_NAME spell.

planeShiftTower.text: Towers of Wizardry and the units inside them exist simultaneously on both planes, so it is unnecessary to plane shift units inside a tower.

planarSeal.text: No travel between planes is possible while Planar Seal is in effect.

cancelText.text: Do you want to cancel the spell completely and lose it? Clicking No will leave the spell untargeted so you can select a target for later in your turn; clicking Yes cancels it completely.

headerWithBothUnits.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACKER_RACE_UNIT_NAME making ATTACK_TYPE attack against DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME:

headerWithDefenderOnly.text: ATTACKER_NAME making ATTACK_TYPE attack against DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME:

headerWithDefenderOnlyExistingCurse.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME trying to shake off ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE spell:

attackWithUnit.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACKER_RACE_UNIT_NAME hits for up to POTENTIAL_HITS of DAMAGE_TYPE:

attackWithoutUnit.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE hits for up to POTENTIAL_HITS of DAMAGE_TYPE:

attackCurse.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE requires resistance roll with POTENTIAL_HITS modifier to avoid being affected:

attackChanceOfDeath.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE has POTENTIAL_HITS% chance of killing defender:

attackEachFigureResistOrDie.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE requires each figure to pass resistance roll with POTENTIAL_HITS modifier to survive:

attackEachFigureResistOrLose1HP.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE requires each figure to pass resistance roll with POTENTIAL_HITS modifier or lose 1 HP:

attackSingleFigureResistOrDie.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE requires single figure to pass resistance roll with POTENTIAL_HITS modifier to survive:

attackResistOrTakeDamage.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE requires passing resistance roll with POTENTIAL_HITS modifier to avoid damage:

attackZeroesAmmo.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE destroys remaining ranged attack ammo

attackResistanceRolls.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE forces unit to make POTENTIAL_HITS resistance rolls:

attackDisintegrate.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE destroys any unit with 9 + POTENTIAL_HITS resistance or less:

attackFear.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE requires passing resistance roll with POTENTIAL_HITS modifier to avoid being frozen in fear:

attackTerror.text: ATTACKER_NAME's ATTACK_TYPE requires passing resistance roll with POTENTIAL_HITS modifier to avoid being terrified:

defenceStatistics.text: CHANCE_TO_HIT% chance to hit, ACTUAL_HITS hit(s) strike DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME, defence DEFENCE_STRENGTH with CHANCE_TO_DEFEND% block, FINAL_HITS hit(s) damage HP.

DEFENDER_NAME subit ACTUAL_DAMAGE points de dégâts - Chacun des DEFENDER_FIGURES personnages se défend avec DEFENCE_STRENGTH * CHANCE_TO_DEFEND% de chance de bloquer = AVERAGE_BLOCK dégâts bloqués en moyenne - Dégâts réellement bloqués par chaque personnage = ACTUAL_BLOCK

defenceStatisticsBlur.text: CHANCE_TO_HIT% chance to hit, ACTUAL_HITS hit(s) strike DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME, Blur dodges BLURRED_HITS hit(s), defence DEFENCE_STRENGTH with CHANCE_TO_DEFEND% block, FINAL_HITS hit(s) damage HP.

defenceStatisticsAutomatic.text: ACTUAL_HITS hit(s) strike DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME, FINAL_HITS hit(s) damage HP.

defenceCursed.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, fails resistance roll and is cursed.

defenceResistsCurse.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, passes resistance roll and avoids curse.

defenceRetainsCurse.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, fails resistance roll and is still cursed.

defenceShakesOffCurse.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, passes resistance roll and shakes off curse.

defenceTerrified.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, fails resistance roll and and cannot move this turn.

defenceResistsTerror.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, passes resistance roll and can move normally this turn.

defenceEachFigureResistOrDie.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, ACTUAL_HITS figures fail resistance roll and die, unit loses FINAL_HITS HP.

defenceEachFigureResistOrLose1HP.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, ACTUAL_HITS figures fail resistance roll, unit loses FINAL_HITS HP.

defenceSingleFigureResistOrDieDies.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH and dies.

defenceSingleFigureResistOrDieSurvives.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH and survives.

defenceResistOrTakeDamage.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, dice roll ACTUAL_HITS so unit loses FINAL_HITS HP.

defenceResistanceRolls.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance MODIFIED_DEFENCE_STRENGTH, fails ACTUAL_HITS resistance rolls, unit loses FINAL_HITS HP.

defenceDisintegrateDies.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH so dies.

defenceDisintegrateSurvives.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH so survives dies.

defenceFear.text: DEFENDER_NAME's DEFENDER_RACE_UNIT_NAME has resistance DEFENCE_STRENGTH, ACTUAL_HITS figures fail resistance roll and become frozen in fear.

wallWrecked.text: PERCENTAGE% chance to knock down wall - success.

wallFailed.text: PERCENTAGE% chance to knock down wall - failed.

confusionDoNothing.text: PLAYER_NAME's RACE_UNIT_NAME will do nothing this turn.

confusionMoveRandomly.text: PLAYER_NAME's RACE_UNIT_NAME will move randomly this turn.

confusionOwnerControlled.text: PLAYER_NAME's RACE_UNIT_NAME will be controlled by PLAYER_NAME this turn.

confusionCasterControlled.text: PLAYER_NAME's RACE_UNIT_NAME will be controlled by CASTER_NAME this turn.

baseGrowthRate.text: Base growth rate = ((MAXIMUM_POPULATION_DIV_1000 - CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 + 1) / 2 rounding up) x10 = BASE_GROWTH_RATE people per turn
Taux de croissance de base = ((MAXIMUM_POPULATION_DIV_1000 - CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 + 1) / 2 tours) * 10 = BASE_GROWTH_RATE habitants par tour
Bazowe tempo przyrostu = ((MAXIMUM_POPULATION_DIV_1000 - CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 + 1) / 2 zaokrąglając w górę) * 10 = BASE_GROWTH_RATE ludzi na turę

racialGrowthModifier.text: Racial Growth Modifier = RACIAL_GROWTH_MODIFIER people per turn
Modificateur de Croissance pour la Race = RACIAL_GROWTH_MODIFIER habitants par tour
Rasowy modyfikator przyrostu = RACIAL_GROWTH_MODIFIER ludzi na turę

growthBonusFromBuilding.text: BUILDING_NAME increases growth by BUILDING_GROWTH_MODIFIER people per turn
BUILDING_NAME augmente la croissance de BUILDING_GROWTH_MODIFIER habitants par tour
BUILDING_NAME zwiększa przyrost o BUILDING_GROWTH_MODIFIER ludzi na turę

cityGrowthRateTotalAfterStreamOfLife.text: Stream of Life doubles this to STREAM_OF_LIFE_GROWTH_RATE people per turn

housing.text: Housing setting increases growth by HOUSING_PERCENTAGE%

darkRituals.text: Dark Rituals reduces growth by DARK_RITUALS_PERCENTAGE%

percentageModifiers.text: PERCENTAGE_MODIFIERS_PERCENTAGE% * STREAM_OF_LIFE_GROWTH_RATE = PERCENTAGE_MODIFIERS, for overall total of TOTAL_GROWTH_RATE_INCLUDING_PERCENTAGE_MODIFIERS people per turn

difficultyLevelMultiplier.text: AI player gets difficulty level multiplier TOTAL_GROWTH_RATE_INCLUDING_HOUSING * AI_POPULATION_GROWTH_RATE_MULTIPLIER% = TOTAL_GROWTH_RATE_ADJUSTED_FOR_DIFFICULTY_LEVEL

cityGrowthRateCapped.text: But this would go over maximum or under minimum population, so adjusted to CAPPED_GROWTH_RATE people per turn
Mais cela dépasserait la population maximale, alors c'est réduit à CAPPED_GROWTH_RATE habitants par tour
But this would go over maximum population, so reduced to CAPPED_GROWTH_RATE people per turn
Ale przekroczyłoby to maksymalną populację, więc zmniejszone zostało do CAPPED_GROWTH_RATE ludzi na turę

deathRate.text: Population dying at rate of BASE_DEATH_RATE x50 = CITY_DEATH_RATE per turn
La population meurt à un taux de BASE_DEATH_RATE * 50 = CITY_DEATH_RATE par tour
Populacja umiera w tempie BASE_DEATH_RATE * 50 = CITY_DEATH_RATE na turę

atMaximumSize.text: La Cité est à sa taille maximale

productionFromMultiplePopulation.text: NUMBER_DOING_TASK TASK_NAME_PLURAL each producing PRODUCTION_PER_TASK PRODUCTION_TYPE = PRODUCTION_ALL_PEOPLE_DOING_TASK PRODUCTION_TYPE
NUMBER_DOING_TASK TASK_NAME_PLURAL produisent chacun PRODUCTION_PER_PERSON PRODUCTION_TYPE = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE
NUMBER_DOING_TASK TASK_NAME_PLURAL każdy produkuje PRODUCTION_PER_PERSON PRODUCTION_TYPE = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE

goldFromTaxes.text: APPLICABLE_POPULATION population each paying PRODUCTION_PER_PERSON PRODUCTION_TYPE in taxes = PRODUCTION_ALL_PEOPLE PRODUCTION_TYPE
NUMBER_DOING_TASK personnes payant chacun PRODUCTION_PER_PERSON PRODUCTION_TYPE de taxes = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE
NUMBER_DOING_TASK population each paying PRODUCTION_PER_PERSON PRODUCTION_TYPE in taxes = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE

productionFromMultipleTiles.text: TILE_COUNT TILE_TYPE tiles each producing PRODUCTION_PER_TILE PRODUCTION_TYPE = PRODUCTION_ALL_TILES PRODUCTION_TYPE

productionFromMultipleMapFeatures.text: MAP_FEATURE_COUNT MAP_FEATURE each producing PRODUCTION_PER_MAP_FEATURE PRODUCTION_TYPE = PRODUCTION_ALL_MAP_FEATURES PRODUCTION_TYPE

productionFromMapFeatureRaceBonus.text: * MINERAL_BONUS_FROM_RACE grâce à la Race = MAP_FEATURE_PRODUCTION_AMOUNT_AFTER_RACE_BONUS PRODUCTION_TYPE

productionFromMapFeatureBuildingBonus.text: + PERCENTAGE_BONUS% de bonus provenant des bâtiments = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE

productionFromBuildingWithReligiousRetor.text: BUILDING_NAME produces BUILDING_UNMODIFIED_PRODUCTION PRODUCTION_TYPE +RELIGIOUS_PERCENTAGE_BONUS% bonus from RETORT_LIST = BUILDING_MODIFIED_PRODUCTION PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME fournit BUILDING_UNMODIFIED_PRODUCTION PRODUCTION_TYPE + PERCENTAGE_BONUS% bonus de la cornue = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME produkuje BUILDING_UNMODIFIED_PRODUCTION PRODUCTION_TYPE +PERCENTAGE_BONUS% premii z retort = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE

productionFromBuildingNegated.text: BUILDING_NAME producing BUILDING_MODIFIED_PRODUCTION PRODUCTION_TYPE is negated by NEGATED_BY_SPELL_NAME

productionFromFortressPicks.text: FORTRESS_NAME produces PRODUCTION_PER_PICK PRODUCTION_TYPE for each PICK_TYPE xPICK_COUNT= PRODUCTION_ALL_PICKS PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME fournit PRODUCTION_PER_PICK PRODUCTION_TYPE pour chaque PICK_TYPE = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME produkuje PRODUCTION_PER_PICK PRODUCTION_TYPE za każdą PICK_TYPE = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE

productionFromFortressPlane.text: FORTRESS_NAME being on PLANE_NAME produces FORTRESS_PLANE_PRODUCTION PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME étant sur PLANE_NAME fournit PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME będący na PLANE_NAME produkuje PRODUCTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE

percentageBonusFromMultipleTiles.text: TILE_COUNT TILE_TYPE each gives PERCENTAGE_PER_TILE% PRODUCTION_TYPE bonus = PERCENTAGE_ALL_TILES% PRODUCTION_TYPE bonus

percentageBonusFromBuilding.text: BUILDING_NAME procure un bonus de PERCENTAGE_VALUE% PRODUCTION_TYPE

goldTradeBonusFromTileType.text: GOLD_TRADE_BONUS_TILE_TYPE% gold trade bonus from river/ocean

goldTradeBonusFromRoads.text: GOLD_TRADE_BONUS_ROADS% gold trade bonus from direct road connections to other cities

goldTradeBonusFromRace.text: GOLD_TRADE_BONUS_RACE% gold trade bonus from race

goldTradeBonusCapped.text: However trade bonus is capped at CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 x 3% = GOLD_TRADE_BONUS_CAPPED%
Cependant, le bonus commercial est plafonné à CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 * 3% = CAP_VALUE%
However trade bonus is capped at CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 * 3% = CAP_VALUE%

productionPercentageBonusTotal.text: PERCENTAGE_BONUS% of ROUNDED_PRODUCTION_AMOUNT = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT_FROM_PERCENTAGE_BONUS for a total of PRODUCTION_TOTAL_AFTER_BONUS
PERCENTAGE_BONUS% du ROUNDED_PRODUCTION_AMOUNT = PRODUCTION_AMOUNT_FROM_PERCENTAGE_BONUS pour un total de PRODUCTION_TOTAL_AFTER_BONUS

productionPercentagePenaltyTotal.text: PERCENTAGE_PENALTY% of PRODUCTION_TOTAL_AFTER_BONUS = PRODUCTION_LOSS_FROM_PERCENTAGE_PENALTY for a reduction to PRODUCTION_TOTAL_AFTER_PENALTY

overfarmingRuleLine.text: Terrain around the city is only providing FOOD_FROM_TERRAIN food. Trying to produce PRODUCTION_TOTAL_AFTER_PENALTY - FOOD_FROM_TERRAIN = OVERFARMING_AMOUNT in excess of this, so due to overfarming inefficiency only generate OVERFARMING_AMOUNT / 2 = OVERFARMING_PRODUCTION_GAINED for a total of FOOD_FROM_TERRAIN + OVERFARMING_PRODUCTION_GAINED = PRODUCTION_TOTAL_AFTER_OVERFARMING

difficultyLevelMultiplier.text: AI player gets difficulty level multiplier PRODUCTION_AMOUNT_BASE_TOTAL * AI_PRODUCTION_RATE_MULTIPLIER% = TOTAL_ADJUSTED_FOR_DIFFICULTY_LEVEL

productionCapped.text: However value is capped at PRODUCTION_CAPPED

rationsAteByPopulation.text: APPLICABLE_POPULATION population each eating CONSUMPTION_PER_PERSON PRODUCTION_TYPE = CONSUMPTION_ALL_PEOPLE PRODUCTION_TYPE
NUMBER_DOING_TASK personnes mangeant chacun 1 PRODUCTION_TYPE = CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE
NUMBER_DOING_TASK population each eating 1 PRODUCTION_TYPE = CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE

buildingConsumption.text: BUILDING_NAME has maintenance of BUILDING_CONSUMPTION PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME coûte une maintenance de CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE
BUILDING_NAME ma koszt utrzymania CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE

netEffectGain.text: Net gain of PRODUCTION_CAPPED - CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT = NET_GAIN
Gain net de PRODUCTION_AMOUNT - CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT = NET_GAIN
Net gain of PRODUCTION_AMOUNT - CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT = NET_GAIN

netEffectLoss.text: Net loss of CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT - PRODUCTION_CAPPED = NET_LOSS
Perte net de CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT - PRODUCTION_AMOUNT = NET_LOSS
Net loss of CONSUMPTION_AMOUNT - PRODUCTION_AMOUNT = NET_LOSS

tradeGoods.text: Trade Goods setting converts CONVERT_PRODUCTION_FROM_AMOUNT CONVERT_PRODUCTION_FROM_TYPE into an additional CONVERT_PRODUCTION_TO_AMOUNT PRODUCTION_TYPE

taxPercentage.text: TAX_PERCENTAGE% unrest caused by tax rate
TAX_PERCENTAGE% rebelles provoqués par le taux d'imposition

racialPercentage.text: RACE_PERCENTAGE% unrest caused by distrust between capital and city races
RACE_PERCENTAGE% rebelles provoqués par la méfiance entre les races de la Capitale et celle de la Cité

baseValue.text: CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000 population x TOTAL_PERCENTAGE% = BASE_UNREST rebels

racialLiteral.text: RACE_LITERAL from capital and city races
RACE_LITERAL isssus des races de la Capitale et de la Cité

buildingUnrestReductionNegated.text: BUILDING_REDUCTION from BUILDING_NAME negated by NEGATED_BY_SPELL_NAME

retort.text: RELIGIOUS_BUILDING_REDUCTION from religious buildings x RETORT_PERCENTAGE% bonus from RETORT_LIST = RETORT_VALUE
RELIGIOUS_BUILDING_REDUCTION provenant des bâtiments religieux * RETORT_PERCENTAGE% bonus de RETORT_LIST = RETORT_VALUE
RELIGIOUS_BUILDING_REDUCTION from religious buildings * RETORT_PERCENTAGE% bonus from RETORT_LIST = RETORT_VALUE
RELIGIOUS_BUILDING_REDUCTION from religious buildings * RETORT_PERCENTAGE% bonus from RETORT_LIST = RETORT_VALUE

unitReduction.text: UNIT_REDUCTION from UNIT_COUNT non-summoned units stationed in city
UNIT_REDUCTION provenant de UNIT_COUNT unités non-invoquées en garnison dans la Cité

forcePositive.text: However cannot be negative, so set to zero
Peut cependant être négatif, et donc positionné à zéro

forceAll.text: However cannot be greater than the population of the city, so set to CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000
Ne peut cependant être plus élevé que la population de la Cité, et donc positionné à CURRENT_POPULATION_DIV_1000

minimumFarmers.text: However must have MINIMUM_FARMERS farmers, so rebels reduced to TOTAL_AFTER_FARMERS
Cependant, un minimum de MINIMUM_FARMERS fermiers est requis, donc les rebelles sont réduits à TOTAL_AFTER_FARMERS

rushBuyPrompt.text: Do you wish to spend PRODUCTION_VALUE Gold by purchasing A_UNIT_NAME?
Souhaitez-vous dépenser PRODUCTION_VALUE pièces d'or pour l'achat de BUILDING_NAME ?
Do you wish to spend PRODUCTION_VALUE Gold by purchasing a BUILDING_NAME?
Czy chcesz wydać PRODUCTION_VALUE Złota na zakupienie budowli BUILDING_NAME?

sellPromptNormal.text: Do you want to sell your BUILDING_NAME for PRODUCTION_VALUE Gold?
Souhaitez-vous vendre votre BUILDING_NAME pour PRODUCTION_VALUE pièces d'or ?
Chcesz sprzedać budowlę BUILDING_NAME za PRODUCTION_VALUE Złota?

sellPromptPrerequisite.text:
Do you want to sell your BUILDING_NAME for PRODUCTION_VALUE Gold?
This will cease production of your PREREQUISITE_NAME.

Souhaitez-vous vendre votre BUILDING_NAME pour PRODUCTION_VALUE pièces d'or ?
Cela provoquera l'arrêt de la production de votre PREREQUISITE_BUILDING_NAME.

Do you want to sell your BUILDING_NAME for PRODUCTION_VALUE Gold?
This will cease production of your PREREQUISITE_BUILDING_NAME.

Chcesz sprzedać budowlę BUILDING_NAME za PRODUCTION_VALUE Złota?
Miasto zaprzestanie produkcji budowli PREREQUISITE_BUILDING_NAME.

cannotSellSpecialBuilding.text: Vous ne pouvez pas vendre votre BUILDING_NAME !

onlySellOneEachTurn.text: You can only sell back one building each turn.
Vous ne pouvez revendre un bâtiment par tour.
Co turę możesz sprzedać tylko jedną budowlę.

cannotSellRequiredByAnother.text: You cannot sell back your BUILDING_NAME because it is required by the PREREQUISITE_NAME.
Vous ne pouvez pas revendre votre BUILDING_NAME parce qu'il est requis par le PREREQUISITE_BUILDING_NAME.
You cannot sell back your BUILDING_NAME because it is required by the PREREQUISITE_BUILDING_NAME.
Nie możesz sprzedać budowli BUILDING_NAME, ponieważ jest wymagana przy budynku PREREQUISITE_BUILDING_NAME.

buildingDestroyed.text: CITY_NAME's DESTROYED_BUILDING was destroyed by PLAYER_NAME's SPELL_NAME spell

constructionCompleted.text: CITY_NAME has just finished constructing OLD_CONSTRUCTION

constructionAborted.text: CITY_NAME can no longer construct OLD_CONSTRUCTION

nextConstruction.text: and is now starting to construct NEW_CONSTRUCTION

cityGrowth.text: CITY_NAME population has grown from OLD_POPULATION to NEW_POPULATION

cityDeath.text: CITY_NAME population has dropped from OLD_POPULATION to NEW_POPULATION

researchNotChosen.text: You have finished researching OLD_SPELL_NAME and need to choose a new spell to begin researching

researchChosen.text: You have finished researching OLD_SPELL_NAME and are now starting to research NEW_SPELL_NAME

summonedUnitLastTurn.text: Last turn you completed summoning A_UNIT_NAME

summonedUnitBumpedSuffix.text: , but the city was full so the unit was placed outside

summonedUnitNoRoomSuffix.text: , but the city and all nearby terrain was full so the unit was lost

createArtifactLastTurn.text: Last turn you finished crafting ITEM_NAME

targetSpell.text: You have completed casting SPELL_NAME and need to choose a target for it

targetSpellChosenNamed.text: You have completed casting SPELL_NAME and cast it on TARGET

targetSpellChosenUnnamed.text: You have completed casting SPELL_NAME and have chosen a target for it

targetSpellCancelled.text: You have completed casting SPELL_NAME but cancelled it rather than choosing a target for it

targetSpellChosenLastTurnNamed.text: Last turn you completed casting SPELL_NAME and cast it on TARGET

targetSpellChosenLastTurnUnnamed.text: Last turn you completed casting SPELL_NAME and chose a target for it

targetSpellCancelledLastTurn.text: Last turn you completed casting SPELL_NAME but cancelled it rather than choosing a target for it

emptyNodeCaptured.text: Your UNIT_NAME successfully captured a node

ownedNodeCaptured.text: Your UNIT_NAME successfully took over a node from OTHER_PLAYER_NAME's OTHER_UNIT_NAME

emptyNodeCapturedLastTurn.text: Last turn your UNIT_NAME successfully captured a node

ownedNodeCapturedLastTurn.text: Last turn your UNIT_NAME successfully took over a node from OTHER_PLAYER_NAME's OTHER_UNIT_NAME

nodeLost.text: Your UNIT_NAME lost a node to OTHER_PLAYER_NAME's OTHER_UNIT_NAME

nodeLostLastTurn.text: Your UNIT_NAME lost a node to OTHER_PLAYER_NAME's OTHER_UNIT_NAME

heroGainedALevel.text: SIMPLE_UNIT_NAME attained the level of EXPERIENCE_LEVEL_NAME

heroGainedALevelLastTurn.text: Last turn, SIMPLE_UNIT_NAME attained the level of EXPERIENCE_LEVEL_NAME

offerHero.text: SIMPLE_UNIT_NAME offers to join you for COST gold

offerHeroAccepted.text: You hired SIMPLE_UNIT_NAME for COST gold

offerHeroRejected.text: You rejected SIMPLE_UNIT_NAME for COST gold

offerUnit.text: A_UNIT_OF_NAME offer to join you for COST gold

offerUnitAccepted.text: You hired A_UNIT_OF_NAME for COST gold

offerUnitRejected.text: You rejected A_UNIT_OF_NAME for COST gold

offerUnits.text: COUNT UNITS_OF_NAME offer to join you for COST gold

offerUnitsAccepted.text: You hired COUNT UNITS_OF_NAME for COST gold

offerUnitsRejected.text: You rejected COUNT UNITS_OF_NAME for COST gold

offerItem.text: A merchant offers to sell you ITEM_NAME for COST gold

offerItemAccepted.text: You bought ITEM_NAME for COST gold

offerItemRejected.text: You rejected buying ITEM_NAME for COST gold

spellBlast.text: PLAYER_NAME's BLASTING_SPELL spell has caused your SPELL_NAME spell to fizzle.

longTitle.text: Master of Magic - Implode's Multiplayer Edition - Client vVERSION

originalCopyrightLine1.text: Original Master of Magic is Copyright

pickFromList.text: Select a server from the list
Choisissez un serveur dans la liste

enterServer.text: or enter a server IP address below
ou saisissez un adresse IP de serveur ci dessous
lub wpisz poniżej adres IP serwera

kickExistingConnection.text: Kick existing connection using my account

invalidNumberOfPlayers.text: The total number of Human and AI opponents must be between 1 and 13
Le nombre total d'adversaires Humains et IA doit être compris entre 1 et 13
Łączna liczba ludzkich i komputerowych przeciwników musi wynosić od 1 do 13

title.text: Nouvelle Partie : Taille de Carte Personnalisée

zones.text: Terrain generator splits map into zones with size approximately
Le générateur de terrain divise la carte en zones d'une taille approximative
Generator terenu dzieli mapę na obszary o powierzchni mniej więcej

normalLairCount.text: Nombre de tanières de force normale

weakLairCount.text: Nombre de tanières de faible force

continental.text: Chance that raider cities are the race chosen for the continent
Chance que les cités barbares soient de la race sélectionnées pour le continent
Szansa, że miasta neutralne są rasy wybranej dla kontynentu

wrapsLeftRight.text: Mapa zawija się od lewa do prawa?

wrapsTopBottom.text: Mapa zawija się od góry do dołu?

title.text: Nouvelle Partie : Proportion Personnalisée des Terres

treesProportion.text: % of land is trees, split into areas
% des terres sont des arbres, répartis en zones
% lądu to lasy, podzielone na strefy

desertProportion.text: % of land is desert, split into areas
% des terres sont des déserts, répartis en zones
% lądu to pustynie, podzielone na strefy

swampProportion.text: % of land is swamp, split into areas
% des terres sont des marais, répartis en zones
% lądu to bagna, podzielone na strefy

tundraSuffix.text: tiles from the edge of the map
parcelles du bord de la carte

rivers.text: Number of rivers on each plane
Nombre de rivières sur chaque plan

arcanusPrefix.text: Tiles on Arcanus have a 1 in
Pola na Arcanus mają szansę 1 do

arcanusSuffix.text: chance of containing a mineral deposit

myrrorPrefix.text: Tiles on Myrror have a 1 in
Parcelles de Myrror ont 1 chance sur
Pola na Myrrorze mają szansę 1 do

myrrorSuffix.text: chance of containing a mineral deposit

magicPowerPrefix.text: Each square of node aura generates
Chaque parcelle de l'aura d'un noeud génére

arcanusNodeAuraPrefix.text: Each node on Arcanus has an aura between
Chaque noeud sur Arcanus irradie une aura de
Każdy węzeł na Arcanus posiada aurę pomiędzy

myrrorNodeAuraPrefix.text: Each node on Myrror has an aura between
Chaque noeud sur Myrror irradie une aura de
Każdy węzeł na Myrrorze posiada aurę pomiędzy

title.text: Nowa Gra: Własny Poziom Trudności (1 z 2)

wizardCitySize.text: Cité du Sorcier débute à une taille de

raiderCitySizePrefix.text: Cités neutres/barbares débutent à une taille entre

raiderCityGrowthSuffix.text: de plus que la taille initiale

eachWizardOnlyOnce.text: Each wizard can be chosen only once?
Chaque sorcier peut-il n'être choisit qu'une seule fois ?
Każdy czarodziej może zostać wybrany tylko raz?

fameRazingPenalty.text: Fame penalty for razing captured cities?

title.text: Nowa Gra: Własny Poziom Trudności (2 of 2)
Nouvelle Partie : Difficulté Personnalisée de Noeud
Nowa Gra: Własny Poziom Trudności Węzłów
New Game: Custom Fog of War
Nouvelle Partie : Brouillard de Guerre Personnalisé

citiesSpellsCombatAreaEffects.text: Cities, Combat Spells and Combat Area Effects
Cités, Sorts de Combat et Effets Zone de Combat
Miasta, Czary Bojowe i Efekty Obszarowe Walki

constructing.text: Can see what enemy cities are constructing?
Visualiser les en-cours de construction des cités ennemies?
Można zobaczyć, co jest budowane we wrogich miastach?

switchResearch.text: Allow switching which spell is being researched?
Autoriser la permutation du sort qui doit être recherché ?

switchResearchNo.text: No - must finish current research first
Non - obligation de terminer la recherche en cours d'abord
Nie - najpierw trzeba zakończyć obecne badania

switchResearchNotStarted.text: Only if current spell research not started
Seulement si la recherche de sort en cours n'a pas encore commencé
Tylko jeśli obecne badania jeszcze się nie rozpoczęły

switchResearchLose.text: Yes, but lose any current research
Oui, seulement le fruit de la recherche en cours sera perdu
Tak, ale przy stracie obecnych badań

switchResearchFreely.text: Yes, can switch freely with no penalty
Oui, possibilité de changer librement sans pénalité

booksToObtainFirstReduction.text: Spell books to obtain first reduction
Livre de sorts pour obtenir la première réduction
Księgi czarów do otrzymanie pierwszego obniżenia

castingReductionSuffix.text: % de réduction au coût de lancement

castingReductionCombinationAdd.text: Casting cost reductions are added together
Les réductions de coût de lancement s'ajoutent ensemble
Redukcje kosztów rzucania są do siebie dodawane

castingReductionCombinationMultiply.text: Casting cost reductions are multiplied together
Les réductions de coût de lancement se multiplient ensemble
Redukcje kosztów rzucania są przez siebie mnożone

researchBonusCombinationAdd.text: Les bonus de recherche s'ajoutent ensemble
Premie do badań są do siebie dodawane

researchBonusCombinationMultiply.text: Les bonus de recherche se multiplient ensemble
Premie do badań są przez siebie mnożone

castingReductionCap.text: Casting cost reduction is capped at
La réduction de coût de lancement est plafonné à
Redukcja kosztów rzucania ograniczona jest do

researchBonusCap.text: Le bonus de de recherche est plafonné à
Premia do badań ograniczona jest do

maxPerGridCell.text: Maksymalna ilość jednostek w komórce mapy

canExceedMaximumUnitsDuringCombat.text: Can temporarily exceed maximum units per map cell during combat (e.g. with Phantom Warriors, Earth/Air/Fire Elementals)
Peut temporairement dépasser le maximum pendant le combat (ex: avec Guerriers Fantômes, Elémentaux de Terre/Air/Feu)
Może przekroczyć maksimum podczas walki (poprzez Widmowych Wojowników, Żywiołaki Ziemi/Powietrza/Ognia, itp.)

maxHeroes.text: Maksymalna ilość bohaterów w jednym momencie

rollHeroSkillsAtStartOfGame.text: Hero random skills are rolled at the start of the game (so cannot reroll by reloading the game just before spell finishes casting)
Les compétences aléatoires des Héros sont calculés au début de la partie (ainsi, ne seront pas recalculées lors du chargement d'une sauvegarde juste avant qu'un sort ne soit fini d'être lancé)
Losowe cechy bohaterów rzucane na początku gry (więc nie mogą zostać zmienione przez wczytanie gry tuż przed zakończeniem rzucania czaru)

maxHeroItemBonuses.text: Maximum bonuses on a hero item

maxHeroItemSpellCharges.text: Maximum spell charges on a hero item

disableFogOfWar.text: Disable Fog of War (as if all players have Nature Awareness cast all the time)
Désactiver le Brouillard de Guerre (comme si tous les joueurs disposaient en tout temps du sort Connaissance de la Nature)
Wyłącz Mgłę Wojny (tak jakby wszyscy gracze posiadali rzuconą Czujność Natury)

customTooLarge.text: Custom portraits are limited to a maximum size of 218 x 250 pixels.

insufficientPicks.text: You don't have enough picks left to choose PICK, you need PICK_COUNT picks.

prerequisites.text: To select PICK you need: PREREQUISITES.

title.text: Waiting for other Players to Join

planeShiftFailedText.text: The selected unit(s) cannot Planar Travel at this location.

cannotEndTurnPrefix.text: You cannot end turn right now because:

cannotEndTurnResearch.text: You must choose a spell to begin researching, or set your research to zero.

cannotEndTurnNewTurnMessagesSpell.text: You have completed casting spells that you still need to choose targets for.

cannotEndTurnNewTurnMessagesOffer.text: You have an offer you must either accept or reject.

cannotEndTurnUnassignedHeroItems.text: Your item vault is overfull. You must assign some items to heros, or destroy them on the anvil to make more space.

cantBuildCityBecauseUnscouted.text: Cities cannot be built until area scouted
Cités ne peuvent être bâties tant que la zone est inexplorée

cantBuildCityBecauseOfTerrain.text: Cities cannot be built on TILE_TYPE
Cités ne peuvent être bâties sur TILE_TYPE

cantBuildCityBecauseOfFeature.text: Cities cannot be built on MAP_FEATURE
Cités ne peuvent être bâties sur MAP_FEATURE

cantBuildCityTooCloseToAnotherCity.text: Cities cannot be built within CITY_SEPARATION squares of another city
Cités ne peuvent être bâties à moins de CITY_SEPARATION d'une autre cité

canBuildCity.text: Max. Population MAXIMUM_POPULATION Production Bonus +PRODUCTION_BONUS% Gold Bonus +GOLD_BONUS%
Population Max. MAXIMUM_POPULATION Bonus Production +PRODUCTION_BONUS% Bonus Or +GOLD_BONUS%

dismissPrompt.text: Do you wish to disband THE_UNIT_OF_NAME?

linearTextureFilter.text: Smooth textures when zooming in on overland map
Lisser les textures en zoomant sur la carte
Wygładź tekstury podczas przybliżania mapy ogólnej

showFogOfWar.text: Darken areas of the map not currently visible
Assombrir les zones de la carte hors de vue

showOurBorder.text: Show border of territory that we control

showEnemyBorders.text: Show borders of territory that others wizards control

showUnitURNs.text: Show Unit, Building and Spell URNs

unitAttributes.text: Show full breakdown (in top list) for:

unitAttributesStandard.text: Only standard attributes Melee, HP, etc

unitAttributesModifyable.text: Skills with values modifyable by exp, auras, etc

text.text: Do you wish to completely destroy this city?
Czy chcesz całkowicie zniszczyć to miasto?

oneSpellPerTurn.text: You have already cast a spell this combat turn.

youGotGoldFromEnemyCity.text: GOLD_FROM_CITY pièces d'or ont été pillées.

youGotGoldFromRazing.text: GOLD_FROM_RAZING gold earned from destroying buildings.
GOLD_FROM_RAZING pièces d'or gagnées par la destruction des bâtiments.
Zdobyto GOLD_FROM_RAZING sztuk złota ze zniszczonych budynków.

enemyGotGoldFromYourCity.text: GOLD_FROM_CITY pièces d'or ont été perdues

heroItems.text: ITEM_COUNT hero item(s) from heroes that died in battle were added to your fortress vault.

undeadCreatedPlural.text: UNDEAD_COUNT units rise from the dead.

zombieCreatedSingular.text: 1 unit has been transformed into Zombies.

zombiesCreatedPlural.text: ZOMBIE_COUNT units have been transformed into Zombies.

switchResearchDisallowed.text: You can't switch to researching NEW_SPELL_NAME until you've finished researching OLD_SPELL_NAME.

switchResearchLose.text: If you switch to researching NEW_SPELL_NAME before you've finished researching OLD_SPELL_NAME, the RESEARCH_SO_FAR / RESEARCH_TOTAL research progress towards OLD_SPELL_NAME will be lost. Are you sure?

requestCastExistingOverlandEnchantment.text: You have already cast SPELL_NAME. You may cast it again but this will have no effect unless your existing spell is cancelled, disjunctioned or spell bound in the meantime. Continue?

noValidTargets.text: There are no valid targets for a SPELL_NAME spell.

noCombatSpellEffectIDsDefined.text: Definition for spell SPELL_NAME does not specify any combat effects.

alreadyHasAllPossibleCombatSpellEffects.text: You already have an active SPELL_NAME spell in this combat.

noDeadUnitsToBeRaised.text: No suitable units have died yet this combat that could be brought back with a SPELL_NAME spell.

noDeadHeroesToBeResurrected.text: No heroes died that could be brought back with a SPELL_NAME spell.

titleRaiseOwn.text: Select a deceased friendly unit to bring back from the dead.

titleRaiseEither.text: Select a deceased friendly or enemy unit to bring back from the dead.

cantCancelSpellOfReturn.text: You cannot cancel casting the Spell of Return.

confirmCancelSpell.text: Are you sure you want to cancel casting your SPELL_NAME spell?

destroy.text: Do you want to destroy your ITEM_NAME and gain MANA_GAINED mana crystals?

itemSlotHelpTextPrefix.text: The following types of hero items can be used in this slot:

prisonerBumped.text: A_UNIT_NAME, who would not fit here so was moved to an adjacent tile

prisonerEscaped.text: A_UNIT_NAME, who would not fit anywhere so escaped

line3.text: I and only I remain the one

line.text: PLAYER_NAME has started casting the Spell of Mastery
PLAYER_NAME has completed casting the Spell of Mastery

spellBookResearchCostNotStarted.text: Research cost: RESEARCH_TOTAL PRODUCTION_TYPE (Not yet researched)

spellBookOverlandCostReduced.text: Overland casting cost: REDUCED_CASTING_COST PRODUCTION_TYPE (reduced from FULL_CASTING_COST PRODUCTION_TYPE)

spellBookCombatCostReduced.text: Combat casting cost: REDUCED_CASTING_COST PRODUCTION_TYPE (reduced from FULL_CASTING_COST PRODUCTION_TYPE)

spellBookNoSavingThrow.text: Saving throw: None - spell effects cannot be resisted

spellBookSingleSavingThrowModifier.text: Saving throw: Roll against resistance with a SAVING_THROW_MODIFIER saving throw modifier

spellBookMultipleSavingThrowModifiers.text: Saving throw: Roll against resistance with a saving throw modifier between SAVING_THROW_MODIFIER_MINIMUM and SAVING_THROW_MODIFIER_MAXIMUM

spellUpkeepRange.text: Upkeep: Between LOWEST_UPKEEP and HIGHEST_UPKEEP per turn, depending on the unit summoned

experienceLevelBoost.text: , however the wizard having BONUS_LIST boosts this up to EXPERIENCE_LEVEL_NAME level

experienceForNextLevelWithoutBoost.text: It will require EXPERIENCE_REQUIRED more experience points for this unit to achieve the level of NEXT_EXPERIENCE_NATURAL_LEVEL_NAME

experienceForNextLevelWithBoost.text: It will require EXPERIENCE_REQUIRED more experience points for this unit to achieve the level of NEXT_EXPERIENCE_NATURAL_LEVEL_NAME naturally, which with the wizard having BONUS_LIST will push the unit up to NEXT_EXPERIENCE_LEVEL_NAME
